eventPrintFailedMessage: Something went wrong and your print has failed.
eventPrintPausedMessage: Your print has paused. You might need to change the filament color.
eventUserActionNeededMessage: User action needed. You might need to change the filament color.
oauth_url: YOUR OAUTH URL HERE LIKE https://api.example.com/access_token
_description: This example shows you how to integrate with an OAuth API. Make sure to set the OAUTH DATA parameters for 'client_id' and 'client_secret'. First, the OAuth url is called, then the 'access_token' is parsed from the JSON response and set in the HEADER as @access_token. Note: you may have to change the name of @access_token to fit your OAuth response. For instance, it could be @accessToken, @AccessToken, @access-token, etc. depending on what the OAuth response returns.
